Subject: LOD 2019: Submit Your Paper and Meet prominent speakers in the fields
 of Machine Learning, Data Science and Optimization in Siena!
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=318678518
From: Giuseppe Nicosia <nicosia@...>


--000000000000ba097105885bd0a6
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Register today and take advantage of the special rates available for
indivi=
duals attending the 5th International Conference on machine Learning,
Optim=
ization & Data science LOD - An Interdisciplinary Conference: Deep
Learning=
, Optimization and Big Data without Borders, this September 10-13
in Siena.=




https://lod2019.icas.xyz

lod@...



LOD 2019 is a great opportuni=
ty to present your work and congregate with
leaders and experts in the Deep=
 Learning, Optimization and Big Data. Feel
free to check out our keynote sp=
eakers:



=C2=B7              Michael Bronstein, Imperial College London, =
UK



=C2=B7              Marco Gori, University of Siena, Italy



=C2=B7 =
             Arthur Gretton, UCL, UK



=C2=B7              Arthur Guez Goo=
gle DeepMind, Montreal, UK



=C2=B7              Kaisa Miettinen, Universi=
ty of Jyv=C3=A4skyl=C3=A4, Finland



=C2=B7              Jan Peters, Techn=
ische Universitaet Darmstadt



=C2=B7              Mauricio Resende, Amazo=
n, USA



=C2=B7              Richard E. Turner, University of Cambridge, U=
K





Submit your Paper by May 10

https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=
=3Dlod2019



LOD 2019 will focus on advances in science, technology and ap=
plications in
the fields of Machine Learning, Data Science and Optimization=
.



Sessions



=C2=B7              LOD 2019 Big-Data Challenge:  Our spon=
sor, Neodata Lab, will
offer a prize of =E2=82=AC2000 to the applicant who =
develops the most accurate
algorithm to process an =E2=80=9Capproximate SQL=
-like query answering system=E2=80=9D on a
real dataset.

=C2=B7           =
   Multi-Task Learning

=C2=B7              Reinforcement Learning

=C2=B7 =
             Deep Learning

=C2=B7              Generative Adversarial Netw=
orks

=C2=B7              Deep Neuroevolution

=C2=B7              Networks=
 with Memory

=C2=B7              Learning from Less Data and Building Smal=
ler Models

=C2=B7              Simulation Environments to understand how A=
I Systems Learn

=C2=B7              Chatbots and Conversational Agents

=
=C2=B7              Data Science at Scale & Data in the Cloud

=C2=B7      =
        Urban Informatics & Data-Driven Modelling of Complex Systems

=C2=
=B7              Data-centric Engineering

=C2=B7              Data Securit=
y, Traceability of Information & GDPR

=C2=B7              Economic Data Sc=
ience



https://lod2019.icas.xyz

lod@...

--000000000000ba097105885bd0a6
